Create a cylinder approximation (n-faced prism) with base faces centered on A and B with given radius...
Access the vertices normals.
Create an axis-aligned cubic mesh with the given half extents, centered on the origin.
Appends another mesh to this one, but only if they have the same attributes.
add a render object to display the Gizmo
Create a 2D grid mesh with given number of row and columns.
Called every time the underlying transform may have changed.
Access the vertices positions.
Get two vectors orthogonal to a given vector.
Get the cosine of the angle between two vectors.
Utility function colorzing the mesh with a given color. Add the color attribute if needed...
Check that the mesh is well built, asserting when it is not.
Returns the sign of any numeric type as { -1, 0, 1}.
Get attribute by handle.
Return true if *this and other have the same attributes, same amount and same names.
Add a new render object to the component. This adds the RO to the manager for drawing.
Shortcut to access the render object manager.
Access an element with a D-dimensional index.
read access to the gizmo render objects id
